Classes in de.systemagmbh.interfaces.config used by de.systemagmbh.components.config
CSysConfigCastException
          This exception wraps NumberFormatExceptions in getXXXValue() methods.
CSysConfigFormatException
          This exception is thrown when an operation on a tree node fails (e. g. add a parameter as a child to a parameter)
CSysConfigIOException
          This exception is thrown when the get/set of data fails.
CSysItemNotFoundException
          This exception is thrown when an element could not be found in the configuration.
ISysConfig
          An ISysConfig object holds a configuration tree and all informations necessary to load and save the configuration back to the place where it came from.
ISysConfigItem
          The configuration tree item.
